General.Name: Jiangsu Eazytec Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Eazytec Co., Ltd. develops cloud computing equipment core firmware products in China. The company offers basic input output system (BIOS) and base board management controller (BMC) firmware products; and government and enterprise, and Internet of Things cloud services. it serves to CPU manufacturers, computing equipment manufacturers, government, and enterprises. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Yixing, China.
